H0.text: The nervous system is most likely related to a problem causing a lack of control in the muscular system.

H1.text: The immune system is the organ system most likely related to a lack of control in the muscular system.

H2.text: Excretory is the organ system most likely related to a problem that causes lack of control in the muscular system.

H3.text: Digestive is the organ system most likely related to a problem when there is a lack of control in the muscular system.

A4.text: The primary function of the nervous system is to control the body.

A5.text: The nervous system sends output signals to muscles or glands to activate the response.
